front.title: •Rescue In The Clouds
front.gametext: USED: If you have a character on Weather Vane, place that character on your Used Pile.  LOST: Deploy one or more vehicles, starfighters and pilots (at normal use of the Force) as a 'react' to a cloud sector.

rulings: The first function works against Gravity Shadow only if Gravity Shadow was targeting a pilot character (not a permanent pilot).
The second function plays during the weapons segment, scheduling the 'battle destiny if unable to otherwise' for later.
